name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol is indicated for fever, common cold and influenza, headache, toothache, earache, bodyache etc.

name: Sergel
description: Esomeprazole is indicated to relieve from chronic heartburn symptoms and other symptoms associated with GERD.

name: Cal-Coral-D
description: This is indicated for the treatment & prevention of osteoporosis, osteomalacia, tetany, hypoparathyroidism, disorders of osteogenesis.

name: Dimerol
description: Gliclazide is a medicine that reduces blood sugar levels (oral antidiabetic medicine belonging to the sulphonylurea group).

name: Tuska
description: This is indicated for the symptomatic relief of upper respiratory tract disorders accompanied by productive cough.

name: Seclo
description: Omeprazole is indicated for the treatment of- Gastric and duodenal ulcer.

name: Pevisone
description: Econazole Nitrate & Triamcinolone Acetonide indicated for the treatment of: Eczematous Mycoses Psoriasis.

description: Omeprazole is indicated for the treatment of- Gastric and duodenal ulcer.
